scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: There are two sets of annotated copies of the typescript and one annotated author's set of page proofs for George Green Shackelford's book, George Wythe Randolph and the Confederate Elite(The University of Georgia Press, Athens, 1988). Each set contains autograph revisions by the author.
